description:
Sunny Peace and Moon Tempest make it to the Next Venus Grand Prix finals. http://anidb.net/ch114695 [Kouhei] joins http://anidb.net/ch111715 [Sakura] for her regular health check-up at the hospital. Things get complicated when the public points out Sakura`s singing sounds exactly like http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana]`s.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kimi wa Kimi no Mama de Ii
You`re Good Just the Way You Are
